name: Charming Elimination - Funny Match Puzzle Games
name_original: Charming Elimination - Funny Match Puzzle Games
description:
Use different shapes to eliminate superimposed blocks

Features:
Puzzle elimination, Exercise brains
Support rotation, full of strategy
Relax and enjoy a lot of fun
A variety of modes, Simply can not stop
Level mode: from simple to difficult, step by step
Free mode: have strategy to eliminate, for high scores
Challenge mode: both strategy and luck
World Ranking: Show your record

The props in the game (Level mode and Free mode available):
Bomb: Eliminate the blocks around the grid
Big Head Nail: Eliminate all blocks in the current grid

Level mode: Eliminate all blocks by giving given shapes. The top 40 levels are basic, next levels are more and more difficult, challenging full!
Some level is too difficult to play, maybe you have tried several times and did not pass? It doesn't matter, you can use 100 gems to get a bomb and big head nail props to continue the game.

Free mode:
Each time there are three shapes to choose from, choose one you think the best to eliminate blocks. Every time you complete a round, you can get a bomb and a big head nail props. More rounds, much difficult. Through your talent and a little bit of luck, try to get the highest score!
Tip:
1) to reduce the occurrence of block isolation
2) props as far as possible in the final use of each round

Challenge mode:
Every time you have only one shape to choose from, put it in the best position, try to eliminate more blocks!
